name: unity_2_theme_builder
description: A package of utilities used to theme our site

scripts.scss-dev-communityrelations: mkdir -p css && node-sass --source-map true --source-comments true --source-map-contents true --output-style expanded project/sites/communityrelations/themes/communityrelations_theme/src/scss/ -o project/sites/communityrelations/themes/communityrelations_theme/css/
